function debounce(fn, wait) {
  let timer = null;
  return function() {
    if (timer) {
      //   
      clearTimeout(timer);
      timer = null;
    }
    timer = setTimeout(function() {
      fn(); // wait(debounce) 
    }, wait);
  };
}
let actionFn = function() {
  console.log(''); // 
};
setInterval(debounce(actionFn, 500), 1000); // 1500ms1000ms
setInterval(debounce(actionFn, 2000), 1000); // ,

function throttle(fn, gapTime) {
  let _lastTime = null;
  return function() {
    let _nowTime = +new Date();
    if (_nowTime - _lastTime > gapTime || !_lastTime) {
      // !_lastTime 
      fn();  // -    
      _lastTime = _nowTime; // 
    }
  };
}
let actionFn = () => {
  console.log(''); // 
};

function Watcher(el, vm, val, attr) {
    this.el = el; // DOM
    this.vm = vm; // myVue
    this.val = val; //  
    this.attr = attr; // domvalueinput / innerHTMLdom
    this.update(); // 
}
Watcher.prototype.update = function () { 
    this.el[this.attr] = this.vm._data[this.val]; // data dom 
}

Object.defineProperty()dataget set

myVue.prototype._observer = function (obj) {
    var _this = this;
    Object.keys(obj).forEach(key => { // 
        _this._watcherTpl[key] = { // ()
            _directives: []
        };
        var value = obj[key]; // 
        var watcherTpl = _this._watcherTpl[key]; // 
        Object.defineProperty(_this._data, key, { //  set get
            configurable: true,  // 
            enumerable: true, // 
            get() {
                console.log(`${key}${value}`);
                return value; //  
            },
            set(newVal) { //  set
                console.log(`${key}${newVal}`);
                if (value !== newVal) {
                    value = newVal;
                    watcherTpl._directives.forEach((item) => { //  
                        item.update();
                        // (v-model+v-bind+{{}}) this._compile()Watcher   
                    });
                }
            }
        })
    });
}

# Compile

  • dom
myVue.prototype._compile = function (el) {
    var _this = this, nodes = el.children; // appdom
    for (var i = 0, len = nodes.length; i < len; i++) { // dom
        var node = nodes[i];
        if (node.children.length) {
            _this._compile(node);  //  dom
        }
        // v-modelINPUTTEXTAREAinput    
        if (node.hasAttribute('v-model') && (node.tagName = 'INPUT' || node.tagName == 'TEXTAREA')) {
            node.addEventListener('input', (function (key) {
                var attVal = node.getAttribute('v-model'); // v-model
                _this._watcherTpl[attVal]._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                    node,
                    _this,
                    attVal,
                    'value'
                ));
                return function () {
                    _this._data[attVal] = nodes[key].value;  // input  set=>setwatch 
                }
            })(i));
        }
        if (node.hasAttribute('v-bind')) { // v-bind 
            var attrVal = node.getAttribute('v-bind'); // data
            _this._watcherTpl[attrVal]._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                node,
                _this,
                attrVal,
                'innerHTML'
            ))
        }
            
        var reg = /\{\{\s*([^}]+\S)\s*\}\}/g, txt = node.textContent;   // {{}} 
        if (reg.test(txt)) {
            node.textContent = txt.replace(reg, (matched, placeholder) => {
                    // matched, placeholder 
                var getName = _this._watcherTpl; // watch
                getName = getName[placeholder];  // watch 
                if (!getName._directives) { //  
                    getName._directives = [];
                }
                getName._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                    node,
                    _this,
                    placeholder,
                    'innerHTML'
                ));
                return placeholder.split('.').reduce((val, key) => {
                    return _this._data[key]; //  get

function move(step){ //
        //   
        //step 12div1div positin
    var pikaqiu1=box.eq(position);//
    var pikaqiu2=box.eq(position+step);//
    var pushBox=box.eq(position+step*2);//
    if(!pikaqiu2.hasClass('type4')&&( pikaqiu2.hasClass('type1')||pikaqiu2.hasClass('type2'))){ //
        //divclasstype4() divtype1()type2()
        //type4type4
        pikaqiu1.removeClass("pusher"); //
        pikaqiu2.addClass("pusher");//
        position=position+step;//position
    }
    else if((pikaqiu2.hasClass('type4'))&&(!pushBox.hasClass('type4'))&&(pushBox.hasClass('type1')|| pushBox.hasClass('type2')) ) {
        //    
        //divclasstype4() type4()  class type1 type2()
        pikaqiu2.removeClass('type4');//
        pikaqiu1.removeClass("pusher");//
        pushBox.addClass('type4');//
        pikaqiu2.addClass("pusher").addClass("type2");//
        //type4 class
        position=position+step;//position 
    }
}

function barrage(){
    // 15
    // /+1
    //vue data clearInterval(this.data);

    //
        _this.barrageStatus.divStatus.intervalid=setInterval( selfTime,1100);
        function selfTime() {
        if(_this.dataNum>=_this.barrageStatus.data.length){
        //dataNum
            _this.dataNum=0;
        }
    //false
        if(divStatus.div1===false){
        //
        divStatus.div1=true;
        _this.dataNum++;
        return barrageOut(_this.barrageStatus.data[_this.dataNum-1].content,_this.barrageStatus.data[_this.dataNum-1].commentator.headImgUrl,_this.dataNum);
        }
    };

    // 
    function barrageOut(text,imgUrl,num) {
    //text,imgUrl:,num:
    if(num%4==1){
    //  
        barrageLayer=document.getElementById('barrageLayer1');
    }

    // dom dom style
    let divBox = document.createElement('div');
    let divBoxImg=document.createElement('span');
    let divBoxText=document.createElement('span');
    divBox.setAttribute('class','barrageDivClass');
    divBoxText.innerHTML=text;
    divBox.appendChild(divBoxImg);
    divBoxImg.setAttribute('class','barrageDivClass_img');
    divBoxImg.style.backgroundImage=`url(${imgUrl})`;
    divBox.appendChild(divBoxText);
    divBox.style.left=document.body.clientWidth+2000+'px';// left,
    barrageLayer.appendChild(divBox);

    // dom
    let time,l=0;
    time= setInterval(function(){
        if(text.length<15){
        // 
        l=l-1;
        }else{
        l=l-2;
        }

        //leftdiv 
        divBox.style.left = document.body.clientWidth+l+'px';
        let delDiv=()=>{
            if(num%4==1){
                // 
                barrageLayer=document.getElementById('barrageLayer1');
                if(barrageLayer.childNodes.length<2){
                //2false
                divStatus.div1=false;
                }else{
                divStatus.div1=true;
                }
            }
        }
        }
        if( l <= (0-divBox.offsetWidth-120) ){
        if(_this.barrageStatus.divStatus.switch==true){ //
            delDiv();
            if(l <= (0-divBox.offsetWidth-document.body.clientWidth) ){
            //left,120
                barrageLayer.removeChild(divBox); //dom
                clearInterval(time);//div
            }
        }else{
            clearInterval(time);//div
        }
        }
    },20)
    }
}

document.body.oncopy = event => {
  event.preventDefault(); // 
  let textFont,
    copyFont = window.getSelection(0).toString(); //

      '\n' +
      '';
  } else {
    textFont = copyFont; //  
  }
  if (event.clipboardData) {
    return event.clipboardData.setData('text', textFont); // 
  } else {
    // IE
    return window.clipboardData.setData('text', textFont);
  }
};

/**
 * @param numbers: An array of Integer
 * @param target: target = numbers[index1] + numbers[index2]
 * @return: [index1, index2] (index1 < index2)
 */
const twoSum = function(numbers, target) {
  let map = {};
  // key : the complement (target - num)
  // value: index for that num
  for (let i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) {
    const num = numbers[i];
    if (map[num] !== undefined) {
      // 
      return [map[num], i]; // index   
    } else {
      //   index
      map[target - num] = i; // 
    }
  }
  return [-1, -1];
};
console.log(twoSum([2, 7, 11, 15], 9), twoSum([2, 33, 11, 2], 4));

const validPalindrome = s => {
  let left = 0;
  let right = s.length - 1;
  while (left < right) {
    if (s[left] !== s[right]) {
      //  true
      return (
        isSubPalindrom(s, left + 1, right) || isSubPalindrom(s, left, right - 1)
      );
    }
    left++;
    right--;
  }
  return true; // true
};
const isSubPalindrom = (s, left, right) => {
  while (left < right) {
    if (s[left] !== s[right]) {
      return false; //  false
    }
    left++;
    right--;
  }
  return true; // true
  // leftright right
};
console.log(
  ':',
  validPalindrome('abaacaaa'),
  validPalindrome('ab'),
  validPalindrome('abc'),
  validPalindrome('aabsjdbaa')
);

  if (type === 'first') {
    // 
    while (left < right) {
      if (s[left] !== s[right]) {
        return (
          validPalindrome(s, left + 1, right, 'second') ||
          validPalindrome(s, left, right - 1, 'second')
        ); //  true
      }
      left++;
      right--;
    }
    return true; // true
  } else {
    //   false
    while (left < right) {
      if (s[left] !== s[right]) {
        return false;
      }
      left++;
      right--;
    }
    return true; // true
    // leftright right
  }
};
console.log(
  ':',
  validPalindrome('abaacaaa'),
  validPalindrome('ab'),

function debounce(fn, wait) {
  let timer = null;
  return function() {
    if (timer) {
      //   
      clearTimeout(timer);
      timer = null;
    }
    timer = setTimeout(function() {
      fn(); // wait(debounce) 
    }, wait);
  };
}

function Watcher(el, vm, val, attr) {
    this.el = el; // DOM
    this.vm = vm; // myVue
    this.val = val; //  
    this.attr = attr; // domvalueinput / innerHTMLdom
    this.update(); // 
}
Watcher.prototype.update = function () { 
    this.el[this.attr] = this.vm._data[this.val]; // data dom 
}

Object.defineProperty()dataget set

myVue.prototype._observer = function (obj) {
    var _this = this;
    Object.keys(obj).forEach(key => { // 
        _this._watcherTpl[key] = { // ()
            _directives: []
        };
        var value = obj[key]; // 
        var watcherTpl = _this._watcherTpl[key]; // 
        Object.defineProperty(_this._data, key, { //  set get
            configurable: true,  // 
            enumerable: true, // 
            get() {
                console.log(`${key}${value}`);
                return value; //  
            },
            set(newVal) { //  set
                console.log(`${key}${newVal}`);
                if (value !== newVal) {
                    value = newVal;
                    watcherTpl._directives.forEach((item) => { //  
                        item.update();
                        // (v-model+v-bind+{{}}) this._compile()Watcher   
                    });
                }
            }
        })
    });
}

# Compile

  • dom
myVue.prototype._compile = function (el) {
    var _this = this, nodes = el.children; // appdom
    for (var i = 0, len = nodes.length; i < len; i++) { // dom
        var node = nodes[i];
        if (node.children.length) {
            _this._compile(node);  //  dom
        }
        // v-modelINPUTTEXTAREAinput    
        if (node.hasAttribute('v-model') && (node.tagName = 'INPUT' || node.tagName == 'TEXTAREA')) {
            node.addEventListener('input', (function (key) {
                var attVal = node.getAttribute('v-model'); // v-model
                _this._watcherTpl[attVal]._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                    node,
                    _this,
                    attVal,
                    'value'
                ));
                return function () {
                    _this._data[attVal] = nodes[key].value;  // input  set=>setwatch 
                }
            })(i));
        }
        if (node.hasAttribute('v-bind')) { // v-bind 
            var attrVal = node.getAttribute('v-bind'); // data
            _this._watcherTpl[attrVal]._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                node,
                _this,
                attrVal,
                'innerHTML'
            ))
        }
            
        var reg = /\{\{\s*([^}]+\S)\s*\}\}/g, txt = node.textContent;   // {{}} 
        if (reg.test(txt)) {
            node.textContent = txt.replace(reg, (matched, placeholder) => {
                    // matched, placeholder 
                var getName = _this._watcherTpl; // watch
                getName = getName[placeholder];  // watch 
                if (!getName._directives) { //  
                    getName._directives = [];
                }
                getName._directives.push(new Watcher( // dom set
                    node,
                    _this,
                    placeholder,
                    'innerHTML'
                ));
                return placeholder.split('.').reduce((val, key) => {
                    return _this._data[key]; //  get  
                }, _this.$el);
            });
        }
    }
}

        //type4 class
        position=position+step;//position 
    }
}

function barrage(){
    // 15
    // /+1
    //vue data clearInterval(this.data);

    //
        _this.barrageStatus.divStatus.intervalid=setInterval( selfTime,1100);
        function selfTime() {
        if(_this.dataNum>=_this.barrageStatus.data.length){
        //dataNum
            _this.dataNum=0;
        }
    //false
        if(divStatus.div1===false){
        //
        divStatus.div1=true;
        _this.dataNum++;
        return barrageOut(_this.barrageStatus.data[_this.dataNum-1].content,_this.barrageStatus.data[_this.dataNum-1].commentator.headImgUrl,_this.dataNum);
        }
    };

    // 
    function barrageOut(text,imgUrl,num) {
    //text,imgUrl:,num:
    if(num%4==1){
    //  
        barrageLayer=document.getElementById('barrageLayer1');
    }

    // dom dom style
    let divBox = document.createElement('div');
    let divBoxImg=document.createElement('span');
    let divBoxText=document.createElement('span');
    divBox.setAttribute('class','barrageDivClass');
    divBoxText.innerHTML=text;
    divBox.appendChild(divBoxImg);
    divBoxImg.setAttribute('class','barrageDivClass_img');
    divBoxImg.style.backgroundImage=`url(${imgUrl})`;
    divBox.appendChild(divBoxText);
    divBox.style.left=document.body.clientWidth+2000+'px';// left,
    barrageLayer.appendChild(divBox);

    // dom
    let time,l=0;
    time= setInterval(function(){
        if(text.length<15){
        // 
        l=l-1;
        }else{
        l=l-2;
        }

        //leftdiv 
        divBox.style.left = document.body.clientWidth+l+'px';
        let delDiv=()=>{
            if(num%4==1){
                // 
                barrageLayer=document.getElementById('barrageLayer1');
                if(barrageLayer.childNodes.length<2){
                //2false
                divStatus.div1=false;
                }else{
                divStatus.div1=true;
                }
            }
        }
        }
        if( l <= (0-divBox.offsetWidth-120) ){
        if(_this.barrageStatus.divStatus.switch==true){ //
            delDiv();
            if(l <= (0-divBox.offsetWidth-document.body.clientWidth) ){
            //left,120
                barrageLayer.removeChild(divBox); //dom
                clearInterval(time);//div
            }
        }else{
            clearInterval(time);//div
        }
        }
    },20)
    }
}

  }
};

  var [obj, max, name] = [{}, 1, ''];
  ipLines.forEach(value => {
    if (obj[value]) {
      //  +1
      obj[value]++;
      if (obj[value] > max) { // 
        max = obj[value]; // 
        name = value; // 
      }
    } else {
      //  
      obj[value] = 1;
    }
  });
  return name;
};

  let min = Math.pow(10, n - 1),

/**
 * @param numbers: An array of Integer
 * @param target: target = numbers[index1] + numbers[index2]
 * @return: [index1, index2] (index1 < index2)
 */
const twoSum = function(numbers, target) {
  let map = {};
  // key : the complement (target - num)
  // value: index for that num
  for (let i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) {
    const num = numbers[i];
    if (map[num] !== undefined) {
      // 
      return [map[num], i]; // index   
    } else {
      //   index
      map[target - num] = i; // 
    }
  }
  return [-1, -1];
};
console.log(twoSum([2, 7, 11, 15], 9), twoSum([2, 33, 11, 2], 4));

const licenseKeyFormatting = function(S, K) {
  S = S.replace(/-/g, ''); // -
  let total = [...S].length; // 
  let num = total % K; // 
  let strArr = []; // 
  // 
  if (num !== 0) {
    var str = '';
    var arr = [...S];
    var i = 0;
    for (let item of arr.keys()) {
      i++;
      str += arr[item]; //  
      if (i === num) break;
    }
    arr.splice(0, num); // 
    S = arr.join(''); // S 
    strArr[0] = str; //  
  }
  let spliceNum = `\\w{${K}}`; // 
  let reg = new RegExp(spliceNum, 'gim');
  let strArr2 = S.match(reg); // 
  strArr = strArr.concat(strArr2); // 
  S = strArr.join('-').toUpperCase(); //  
  return S;
};
